about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced metadata fields management and manipulation solution to easily view, update, remove, find, compare, exchange and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Add metadata details to Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIp, Audio and Video file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.

more_features.title: Document Metadata Management
more_features.description: Our comprehensive API streamlines managing document metadata. Access, edit, and manipulate various document properties for improved organization and searchability.

feature_1.title: Metadata Access
feature_1.content: Effortlessly retrieve and process a document's metadata. Gain insights into properties like author, creation date, and many others.

feature_2.title: Metadata Editing
feature_2.content: Modify document metadata directly. Update properties for better organization, searchability, and information accuracy.

feature_3.title: Advanced Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Perform complex operations on document metadata. Efficiently handle tasks like adding custom properties, deleting irrelevant data, and ensuring data consistency.
